verses.verse: Moreover, the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> came<WH1961> to me saying,<WH559>

"And you, son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God<WH3068> to the land<WH127> of Israel,<WH3478> 'An end!<WH7093> The end<WH7093> is coming<WH935> on the four<WH702> corners<WH3671> of the land.<WH776>

'Now<WH6258> the end<WH7093> is upon you, and I shall send<WH7971> My anger<WH639> against you; I shall judge<WH8199> you according to your ways,<WH1870> and I shall bring<WH5414> all<WH3605> your abominations<WH8441> upon you.

'For My eye<WH5869> will have<WH2347> no<WH3808> pity<WH2347> on you, nor<WH3808> shall I spare<WH2550> [you,] but I shall bring<WH5414> your ways<WH1870> upon you, and your abominations<WH8441> will be among<WH8432> you; then you will know<WH3045> that I am the Lord!<WH3068>'
"Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God,<WH3068> 'A disaster,<WH9567> unique<WH259> disaster,<WH9567> behold<WH2009> it is coming!<WH935>
'An end<WH7093> is coming;<WH935> the end<WH7093> has come!<WH935> It has awakened<WH9516> against<WH413> you; behold,<WH2009> it has come!<WH935>

'Your doom<WH6843> has come<WH935> to you, O inhabitant<WH3427> of the land.<WH776> The time<WH6256> has come,<WH935> the day<WH3117> is near<WH7138> â€“ tumult<WH4103> rather<WH3808> than<WH3808> joyful<WH1906> shouting<WH1906> on the mountains.<WH2022>

'Now<WH6258> I will shortly<WH7138> pour<WH8210> out My wrath<WH2534> on you, and spend<WH3615> My anger<WH639> against you, judge<WH8199> you according to your ways,<WH1870> and bring<WH5414> on you all<WH3605> your abominations.<WH8441>

'And My eye<WH5869> will show<WH2347> no<WH3808> pity,<WH2347> nor<WH3808> will I spare.<WH2550> I will repay<WH5414> you according to your ways,<WH1870> while your abominations<WH8441> are in your midst;<WH8432> then you will know<WH3045> that I, the Lord,<WH3068> do the smiting.<WH5221>
'Behold,<WH2009> the day!<WH3117> Behold,<WH2009> it is coming!<WH935> [Your] doom<WH6843> has gone<WH3318> forth;<WH3318> the rod<WH4294> has budded,<WH6692> arrogance<WH2087> has blossomed.<WH6524>

'Violence<WH2555> has grown<WH6965> into a rod<WH4294> of wickedness.<WH7562> None<WH3808> of them [shall remain], none<WH3808> of their multitude,<WH1995> none<WH3808> of their wealth,<WH1991> nor<WH3808> anything eminent<WH5089> among them.

'The time<WH6256> has come,<WH935> the day<WH3117> has arrived.<WH5060> Let not the buyer<WH7069> rejoice<WH8055> nor<WH408> the seller<WH4376> mourn;<WH56> for wrath<WH2740> is against<WH413> all<WH3605> their multitude.<WH1995>

'Indeed,<WH3588> the seller<WH4376> will not regain<WH7725> what<WH4465> he sold<WH4465> as long<WH5750> as they [both] live<WH9130>;<WH9132> for the vision<WH2377> regarding<WH413> all<WH3605> their multitude<WH1995> will not be averted,<WH7725> nor<WH3808> will any<WH376> of them maintain<WH2388> his life<WH9130> by his iniquity.<WH5771>

'They have blown<WH8628> the trumpet<WH8619> and made<WH3559> everything<WH3605> ready,<WH3559> but no<WH369> one<WH369> is going<WH1980> to the battle;<WH4421> for My wrath<WH2740> is against<WH413> all<WH3605> their multitude.<WH1995>

'The sword<WH2719> is outside,<WH2351> and the plague<WH1698> and the famine<WH7458> are within.<WH1004> He who<WH834> is in the field<WH7704> will die<WH4191> by the sword;<WH2719> famine<WH7458> and the plague<WH1698> will also consume<WH398> those in the city.<WH5892>

'Even when their survivors<WH6412> escape,<WH6403> they will be on the mountains<WH2022> like doves<WH3123> of the valleys,<WH1516> all<WH3605> of them mourning,<WH1993> each<WH376> over his own iniquity.<WH5771>
'All<WH3605> hands<WH3027> will hang<WH7503> limp,<WH7503> and all<WH3605> knees<WH1290> will become<WH1980> like water.<WH4325>

'And they will gird<WH2296> themselves with sackcloth,<WH8242> and shuddering<WH6427> will overwhelm<WH3680> them; and shame<WH955> [will be] on all<WH3605> faces,<WH6440> and baldness<WH7144> on all<WH3605> their heads.<WH7218>

'They shall fling<WH7993> their silver<WH3701> into the streets,<WH2351> and their gold<WH2091> shall become<WH1961> an abhorrent<WH5079> thing;<WH5079> their silver<WH3701> and their gold<WH2091> shall not be able<WH3201> to deliver<WH5337> them in the day<WH3117> of the wrath<WH5678> of the Lord.<WH3068> They cannot<WH3808> satisfy<WH7646> their appetite,<WH5315> nor<WH3808> can they fill<WH4390> their stomachs,<WH4578> for their iniquity<WH5771> has become<WH1961> an occasion<WH4383> of stumbling.<WH4383>

'And they transformed<WH7760> the beauty<WH9469> of His ornaments<WH5716> into pride,<WH1347> and they made<WH6213> the images<WH6754> of their abominations<WH8441> [and] their detestable<WH8251> things<WH8251> with it; therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> I will make<WH5414> it an abhorrent<WH5079> thing<WH5079> to them.
'And I shall give<WH5414> it into the hands<WH3027> of the foreigners<WH2114> as plunder<WH957> and to the wicked<WH7563> of the earth<WH776> as spoil,<WH7998> and they will profane<WH2490> it.
'I shall also turn<WH5437> My face<WH6440> from them, and they will profane<WH2490> My secret<WH6845> place;<WH6845> then robbers<WH6530> will enter<WH935> and profane<WH2490> it.
'Make<WH6213> the chain,<WH7569> for the land<WH776> is full<WH4390> of bloody<WH1818> crimes,<WH4941> and the city<WH5892> is full<WH4390> of violence.<WH2555>

'Therefore, I shall bring<WH935> the worst<WH7451> of the nations,<WH1471> and they will possess<WH3423> their houses.<WH1004> I shall also make the pride<WH1347> of the strong<WH5794> ones<WH5794> cease,<WH7673> and their holy<WH6942> places<WH4720> will be profaned.<WH2490>
'When anguish<WH7089> comes,<WH935> they will seek<WH1245> peace,<WH7965> but there<WH369> will be none.<WH369>

'Disaster<WH1943> will come<WH935> upon disaster,<WH1943> and rumor<WH8052> will be [added] to rumor;<WH8052> then they will seek<WH1245> a vision<WH2377> from a prophet,<WH5030> but the law<WH8451> will be lost from the priest<WH6> and counsel<WH3548> from the elders.<WH6098>

'The king<WH4428> will mourn,<WH56> the prince<WH5387> will be clothed<WH3847> with horror,<WH8077> and the hands<WH3027> of the people<WH5971> of the land<WH776> will tremble.<WH926> According<WH4480> to their conduct<WH1870> I shall deal<WH6213> with them, and by their judgments<WH4941> I shall judge<WH8199> them. And they will know<WH3045> that I am the Lord.<WH3068>' "
